name: Fardew Stalley
description:
Turn up the volume so you can hear some sweet tracks and flavor in the intro.

Help James Bonde to raise some money so he can buy a tractor to find out what's at the end of the road! Get 50 gold to buy the tractor

Plant seeds, water them, let them grow and sell them. Go to the shop to buy more farm lands, seed and more.

Press P to plant
Press H  to harvest

Hold Space to fill can from well
Hold Space to water the plant while over them

Place yield on market spot (table) with Space

When buying land, sprinklers and market spots - Left Click to place

IN SHOP

To pick up items, place them on counter and accept the purchase, press Space.
